features.methodology.transparency.title: Transparency & Accuracy
features.methodology.transparency.descri: Our scoring methodology is continuously reviewed and updated based on the latest scientific research and industry standards.
features.methodology.environmental-score: Our environmental scoring evaluates products across multiple environmental impact factors.
Environmental scores range from 0-10, with higher scores indicating lower environmental impact.
Updated weekly with new research data
Environmental data is processed using life cycle assessment (LCA) principles and weighted based on scientific impact studies.
Greenhouse gas emissions during production, transportation, and disposal
Water consumption and pollution impact during manufacturing
Recyclability and sustainability of product packaging
Carbon emissions from transportation and distribution
Environmental impact of disposal and end-of-life management
features.methodology.social-impact.descr: Social impact scoring evaluates the social responsibility aspects of product manufacturing and distribution.
features.methodology.social-impact.overv: Social scores assess fair labor practices, community impact, and supply chain transparency.
features.methodology.social-impact.updat: Updated monthly with new certification data
features.methodology.social-impact.dataP: Social data is gathered from certification bodies, NGO reports, and company transparency reports.
features.methodology.social-impact.facto: Worker rights, safety standards, and fair wage practices
Positive or negative impact on local communities
Transparency in supply chain and sourcing practices
Compliance with international labor and safety standards
Contribution to local economic development and job creation
features.methodology.health-rating.descr: Health ratings evaluate the nutritional value and health impact of food products.
features.methodology.health-rating.overv: Health scores consider nutritional content, processing level, and additive safety.
features.methodology.health-rating.updat: Updated as new nutritional research becomes available
features.methodology.health-rating.dataP: Health data combines nutritional databases with latest health research and dietary guidelines.
features.methodology.health-rating.facto: Macro and micronutrient content and balance
Presence and safety of food additives and preservatives
Level of processing and impact on nutritional value
Verification of health claims and nutritional benefits
Ethical production scores evaluate animal welfare, organic practices, and fair trade compliance.
Ethical scores assess production methods and their alignment with ethical standards.
Updated quarterly with new certification data
Ethical data is sourced from certification bodies, audits, and third-party verification systems.
Animal welfare standards and humane treatment practices
Organic certification and sustainable farming practices
Fair trade compliance and ethical sourcing
Ethical sourcing of raw materials and ingredients
Corporate social responsibility and ethical business practices
features.dataSources.description: CORIA uses trusted, verified data sources to provide accurate sustainability information.
features.dataSources.quality.title: Data Quality Assurance
features.dataSources.quality.verificatio: All data sources undergo rigorous verification to ensure accuracy and reliability.
features.dataSources.quality.accuracy.de: We maintain high accuracy standards through continuous monitoring and validation.
features.dataSources.attribution.title: Data Attribution
features.dataSources.attribution.descrip: We acknowledge and respect the valuable work of our data source partners in making sustainability information accessible.
features.relatedFeatures.description: Explore other features that work together to enhance your sustainable living experience.
features.relatedFeatures.exploreAll.desc: Discover the complete range of CORIA's sustainability features.
features.categories.scanning.title: Product Scanning
features.categories.scanning.longDescrip: Our advanced scanning technology allows you to instantly access comprehensive sustainability information for millions of products. Simply scan a barcode to get detailed environmental, health, and social impact scores.
features.categories.scanning.whyItMatter: Product scanning is the foundation of conscious consumption, enabling informed decisions at the point of purchase.
Join millions making conscious choices through product scanning.
features.categories.ai-recommendations.d: Get personalized sustainable product suggestions powered by AI
features.categories.ai-recommendations.l: Our advanced AI analyzes your preferences, dietary needs, and sustainability goals to provide personalized recommendations for more sustainable alternatives.
features.categories.ai-recommendations.w: AI recommendations help you discover sustainable alternatives you might never have found on your own.
Let AI help you make better sustainable choices.
features.categories.impact-tracking.desc: Monitor your environmental footprint and sustainability progress
features.categories.impact-tracking.long: Track your environmental impact over time with detailed analytics on carbon footprint, water consumption, and other sustainability metrics.
features.categories.impact-tracking.whyI: Understanding your impact is the first step toward meaningful change and sustainable living.
See how your choices make a difference for the planet.
features.categories.smart-pantry.title: Smart Pantry
features.categories.smart-pantry.descrip: Manage your food inventory and reduce waste intelligently
features.categories.smart-pantry.longDes: Transform your pantry into a smart, sustainable food management system that reduces waste, saves money, and helps you shop more efficiently.
features.categories.smart-pantry.whyItMa: Food waste is a major environmental issue. Smart pantry management can significantly reduce your household's food waste.
Reduce waste and save money with intelligent food management.
features.categories.sustainability-scori: Comprehensive environmental, social, and health impact scores
Our comprehensive scoring system evaluates products across multiple dimensions including environmental impact, social responsibility, health effects, and ethical production practices.
Sustainability scoring provides a clear, objective way to compare products and make informed decisions.
Learn how our scoring system helps you make better choices.
features.categories.community.title: Community Features
features.categories.community.longDescri: Join a community of conscious consumers, share your experiences, read reviews, and learn from others on their sustainability journey.
features.categories.community.whyItMatte: Community support and shared knowledge accelerate the adoption of sustainable practices.
Connect with like-minded individuals on the sustainability journey.
features.categories.premium-features.des: Advanced features for serious sustainability enthusiasts
features.categories.premium-features.lon: Unlock advanced features including unlimited scanning, detailed reports, advanced analytics, and an ad-free experience for the ultimate sustainability toolkit.
features.categories.premium-features.why: Premium features provide deeper insights and more comprehensive tools for serious sustainability practitioners.
Unlock the full potential of sustainable living with premium features.
features.categories.data-insights.title: Data Insights
features.categories.data-insights.descri: Advanced analytics and insights into your consumption patterns
features.categories.data-insights.longDe: Gain deep insights into your consumption patterns, visualize your impact over time, and track progress toward your sustainability goals with advanced analytics.
features.categories.data-insights.whyItM: Data-driven insights help you understand your consumption patterns and make more informed decisions.
Discover insights that help you live more sustainably.
features.features.barcode-scan.title: Barcode Scanning
features.features.barcode-scan.shortDesc: Instantly scan product barcodes for sustainability information
features.features.barcode-scan.longDescr: Use your phone's camera to scan any product barcode and instantly access comprehensive sustainability information including environmental impact, health ratings, and ethical production details.
features.features.environmental-score.lo: Our environmental scoring system evaluates products across multiple environmental factors including carbon footprint, water usage, packaging sustainability, and production methods.
features.features.personalized-suggestio: AI-powered recommendations tailored to your preferences
Our AI learns from your scanning history, preferences, and sustainability goals to provide personalized product recommendations that match your values and needs.
features.features.carbon-footprint.title: Carbon Footprint Tracking
features.features.carbon-footprint.short: Monitor your personal carbon footprint from consumption
features.features.carbon-footprint.longD: Track the carbon footprint of your purchases and consumption patterns over time. See how your choices impact the environment and work toward carbon reduction goals.
